- (id ElasticLoadBalancingAppCookieStickinessPolicy.)init  

Default constructor for a new AppCookieStickinessPolicy object.

Callers should use the property methods to initialize this object after creating it.

- (id ElasticLoadBalancingAppCookieStickinessPolicy.)initWithPolicyName: (NSString *)  thePolicyName
andCookieName: (NSString *)  theCookieName 

Constructs a new AppCookieStickinessPolicy object.

Callers should use properties to initialize any additional object members.

Parameters:
thePolicyName The mnemonic name for the policy being created. The name must be unique within the set of policies for this LoadBalancer.
theCookieName The name of the application cookie used for stickiness.

Property Documentation

- (NSString *) policyName [read, write, retain]

The mnemonic name for the policy being created.

The name must be unique within the set of policies for this LoadBalancer.
